title: SaaS firm Whatfix rolls out $58 million buyback programme for employees, investors
description: This buyback is being done at a premium to its second-last funding round, where eight current and former executives sold their vested stock options.
content: Software-as-a-service (SaaS) company Whatfix, which raised $125 million last month, has announced its fourth liquidity programme for employees and investors, worth $58 million.
cleaned_content: software as a service saas company whatfix which raised <ONE_HUNDRED> million last month has announced its fourth liquidity programme for employees and investors worth <FIVE_TEN> million
